menuitem.label: New
menuitem.help: Create new workspace

menuitem.label: Open
menuitem.help: Load workspace from file

menuitem.label: Save
menuitem.help: Save workspace

menuitem.label: Save as
menuitem.help: Save workspace to file

menuitem.label: Close
menuitem.help: Close workspace file

menuitem.label: Load GRC file (Tcl/Tk GUI)
menuitem.help: Load map layers from GRC file to layer tree

menuitem.label: Add raster
menuitem.help: Add raster map layer to current display

menuitem.label: Add vector
menuitem.help: Add vector map layer to current display

menuitem.label: Add multiple rasters or vectors
menuitem.help: Add multiple raster or vector map layers to current display

menuitem.label: Add web service layer
menuitem.help: Add web service layer

menuitem.label: New map display window
menuitem.help: Open new map display window

menuitem.label: Close current map display window
menuitem.help: Close current map display window

menuitem.label: Close all open map display windows
menuitem.help: Close all open map display windows

menuitem.label: Common formats import
menuitem.help: Imports raster data into a GRASS raster map using GDAL library.

menuitem.label: Import of common formats with reprojection
menuitem.help: Imports raster data into a GRASS raster map using GDAL library and reprojects on the fly.

menuitem.label: ASCII x,y,z point import and gridding
ASCII polygons, lines, and point import
SPOT NDVI import
menuitem.help: Imports SPOT VGT NDVI data into a raster map.

menuitem.label: SRTM HGT import
menuitem.help: Imports SRTM HGT files into raster map.

menuitem.label: Terra ASTER HDF import
menuitem.help: Georeference, rectify, and import Terra-ASTER imagery and relative DEMs using gdalwarp.

menuitem.label: Unpack raster map
menuitem.help: Imports a raster map as GRASS GIS specific archive file (packed with r.pack)

menuitem.label: Reproject raster map from different GRASS location
Common import formats
menuitem.help: Imports vector data into a GRASS vector map using OGR library.

menuitem.label: Import of common formats with reprojection
menuitem.help: Imports vector data into a GRASS vector map using OGR library and reprojects on the fly.

menuitem.label: ASCII points or GRASS ASCII format
ASCII points as a vector lines
menuitem.help: Imports ASCII x,y[,z] coordinates as a series of lines.

menuitem.label: DXF import
menuitem.help: Converts files in DXF format to GRASS vector map format.

menuitem.label: WFS
menuitem.help: Imports GetFeature from a WFS server.

menuitem.label: ESRI e00 import
menuitem.help: Imports E00 file into a vector map.

menuitem.label: Geonames import
menuitem.help: Imports geonames.org country files into a vector points map.

menuitem.label: Matlab array or Mapgen format import
menuitem.help: Imports Mapgen or Matlab-ASCII vector maps into GRASS.

menuitem.label: Unpack vector map
menuitem.help: Imports a vector map as GRASS GIS specific archive file (packed with v.pack)

menuitem.label: Reproject vector map from different GRASS location
Common import formats
menuitem.help: Imports attribute tables in various formats.

menuitem.label: ASCII x,y,z points export
menuitem.help: Exports a raster map to a text file as x,y,z values based on cell centers.

menuitem.label: Pack raster map
menuitem.help: Exports a raster map as GRASS GIS specific archive file

menuitem.label: ASCII points or GRASS ASCII vector export
Pack vector map
menuitem.help: Exports a vector map as GRASS GIS specific archive file

menuitem.label: Common export formats
menuitem.help: Exports attribute tables into various formats.

menuitem.label: Link external raster data
menuitem.help: Link GDAL supported raster data as a pseudo GRASS raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Link external vector data
menuitem.help: Creates a new pseudo-vector map as a link to an OGR-supported layer.

menuitem.label: Output format for vector data
menuitem.help: Defines vector output format utilizing OGR library.

menuitem.label: Georectify
menuitem.help: Manage Ground Control Points for Georectification

menuitem.label: Graphical modeler
menuitem.help: Launch Graphical modeler

menuitem.label: Run model
menuitem.help: Run model prepared by Graphical modeler

menuitem.label: Animation tool
menuitem.help: Launch animation tool.

menuitem.label: Bearing/distance to coordinates
menuitem.help: A simple utility for converting bearing and distance measurements to coordinates and vice versa. It assumes a cartesian coordinate system

menuitem.label: Cartographic Composer
menuitem.help: Launch Cartographic Composer

menuitem.label: Map Swipe
menuitem.help: Launch Map Swipe

menuitem.label: Launch script
menuitem.help: Launches script file.

menuitem.label: Close GUI
menuitem.help: Quit wxGUI session.

menuitem.label: Quit GRASS GIS
menuitem.help: Quit wxGUI session and exit GRASS shell.

menuitem.label: Display region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

menuitem.label: Mapset access
menuitem.help: Set/unset access to other mapsets in current location

menuitem.label: User access
menuitem.help: Controls access to the current mapset for other users on the system. If no option given, prints current status.

menuitem.label: Change working environment
menuitem.help: Changes/reports current mapset. Optionally create new mapset or list available mapsets in given location.

menuitem.label: Change location and mapset
menuitem.help: Change current location and mapset.

menuitem.label: Change mapset
menuitem.help: Change current mapset.

menuitem.label: Change working directory
menuitem.help: Change working directory

menuitem.label: Show settings
menuitem.help: Outputs and modifies the user's current GRASS variable settings.

menuitem.label: Change settings
menuitem.help: Outputs and modifies the user's current GRASS variable settings. Prints all defined GRASS variables if no option is given.

menuitem.label: Create new location
menuitem.help: Launches location wizard to create new GRASS location.

menuitem.label: Create new mapset
menuitem.help: Creates new mapset in the current location, changes current mapset.

menuitem.label: Version and copyright
menuitem.help: Displays version and copyright information.

menuitem.label: Display map projection
menuitem.help: Converts co-ordinate system descriptions (i.e. projection information) between various formats (including GRASS format).

menuitem.label: Manage projections
menuitem.help: Prints or modifies GRASS projection information files (in various co-ordinate system descriptions). Can also be used to create new GRASS locations.

menuitem.label: Convert coordinates
menuitem.help: Converts coordinates from one projection to another (cs2cs frontend).

menuitem.label: Install extension from addons
menuitem.help: Installs new extension from GRASS AddOns SVN repository.

menuitem.label: Manage installed extension
menuitem.help: Updates or removes installed GRASS AddOns extension(s).

menuitem.label: Preferences
menuitem.help: User GUI preferences (display font, commands, digitizer, etc.)

menuitem.label: Reproject raster map from different GRASS location
Tiling
menuitem.help: Produces tilings of the source projection for use in the destination region and projection.

menuitem.label: Color tables (stddev)
menuitem.help: Sets color rules based on stddev from a raster map's mean value.

menuitem.label: Manage color rules interactively
menuitem.help: Interactive management of raster color tables.

menuitem.label: Blend 2 color rasters
menuitem.help: Blends color components of two raster maps by a given ratio.

menuitem.label: Grow by one cell
menuitem.help: Generates a raster map layer with contiguous areas grown by one cell.

menuitem.label: Mask
menuitem.help: Creates a MASK for limiting raster operation.

menuitem.label: Raster map calculator
menuitem.help: Raster map calculator

menuitem.label: Apply shade to raster
menuitem.help: Drapes a color raster over an shaded relief or aspect map.

menuitem.label: Grow
menuitem.help: Generates a raster map layer with contiguous areas grown by one cell.

menuitem.label: Set up sampling and analysis framework
menuitem.help: Configuration editor for r.li.'index'

menuitem.label: Interactively edit category values
menuitem.help: Edits cell values in a raster map.

menuitem.label: Reclassify by size
menuitem.help: Reclasses a raster map greater or less than user specified area size (in hectares).

menuitem.label: Plane
menuitem.help: Creates raster plane map given dip (inclination), aspect (azimuth) and one point.

menuitem.label: Bilinear and bicubic from vector points
Ordinary or block kriging
menuitem.help: Performs ordinary or block kriging.

menuitem.label: Fill NULL cells
menuitem.help: Fills no-data areas in raster maps using spline interpolation.

menuitem.label: Sum area by raster map and category
Create new vector map
menuitem.help: Create new empty vector map

menuitem.label: Dissolve boundaries
menuitem.help: Dissolves boundaries between adjacent areas sharing a common category number or attribute.

menuitem.label: Reproject vector map from different GRASS location
Rebuild topology on all vector maps
menuitem.help: Rebuilds topology on all vector maps in the current mapset.

menuitem.label: Clean vector map
menuitem.help: Toolset for cleaning topology of vector map.

menuitem.label: Add centroids
menuitem.help: Adds missing centroids to closed boundaries.

menuitem.label: Manage color rules interactively
menuitem.help: Interactive management of vector color tables.

menuitem.label: Vector network analysis tool
menuitem.help: Tool for interactive vector network analysis.

menuitem.label: Shortest path for sets of features
Update area attributes from raster
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics from a raster map based on a vector map and uploads statistics to new attribute columns.

menuitem.label: Update point attributes from areas
menuitem.help: Uploads vector values at positions of vector points to the table.

menuitem.label: Sample raster maps at point locations
Report topology by category
menuitem.help: Reports geometry statistics for vector maps.

menuitem.label: Univariate statistics for attribute columns
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics on selected table column for a GRASS vector map.

menuitem.label: Create/edit group
menuitem.help: Creates, edits, and lists groups of imagery files.

menuitem.label: Mosaic images
menuitem.help: Mosaics several images and extends colormap.

menuitem.label: Color balance for RGB
menuitem.help: Performs auto-balancing of colors for RGB images.

menuitem.label: Histogram
menuitem.help: Generate histogram of image

menuitem.label: Spectral response
menuitem.help: Displays spectral response at user specified locations in group or images.

menuitem.label: Pan sharpening
menuitem.help: Image fusion algorithms to sharpen multispectral with high-res panchromatic channels

menuitem.label: Interactive input for supervised classification
menuitem.help: Generates spectral signatures by allowing the user to outline training areas.

menuitem.label: Tasseled cap vegetation index
menuitem.help: Performs Tasseled Cap (Kauth Thomas) transformation.

menuitem.label: OIF for LandSat TM
menuitem.help: Calculates Optimum-Index-Factor table for spectral bands

menuitem.label: Manage timestamp
menuitem.help: Print/add/remove a timestamp for a 3D raster map

menuitem.label: 3D raster map calculator
menuitem.help: 3D raster map calculator

menuitem.label: List databases
menuitem.help: Lists all databases for a given driver and location.

menuitem.label: List drivers
menuitem.help: Lists all database drivers.

menuitem.label: List tables
menuitem.help: Lists all tables for a given database.

menuitem.label: Describe table
menuitem.help: Describes a table in detail.

menuitem.label: List columns
menuitem.help: List all columns for a given table.

menuitem.label: Connect
menuitem.help: Prints/sets general DB connection for current mapset.

menuitem.label: Login
menuitem.help: Sets user/password for DB driver/database.

menuitem.label: Create database
menuitem.help: Creates an empty database.

menuitem.label: Drop database
menuitem.help: Removes an existing database.

menuitem.label: Drop table
menuitem.help: Drops an attribute table.

menuitem.label: Copy table
menuitem.help: Copy a table. Either 'from_table' (optionally with 'where') can be used or 'select' option, but not 'from_table' and 'select' at the same time.

menuitem.label: Drop column
menuitem.help: Drops a column from selected attribute table.

menuitem.label: Test
menuitem.help: Test database driver, database must exist and set by db.connect.

menuitem.label: Query any table
menuitem.help: Selects data from attribute table. Performs SQL query statement(s).

menuitem.label: SQL statement
menuitem.help: Executes any SQL statement. For SELECT statements use 'db.select'.

menuitem.label: New table
menuitem.help: Creates and connects a new attribute table to a given layer of an existing vector map.

menuitem.label: Remove table
menuitem.help: Removes existing attribute table of a vector map.

menuitem.label: Join table
menuitem.help: Joins a database table to a vector map table.

menuitem.label: Add columns
menuitem.help: Adds one or more columns to the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Drop column
menuitem.help: Drops a column from the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Rename column
menuitem.help: Renames a column in the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Change values
menuitem.help: Updates a column in the attribute table connected to a vector map.

menuitem.label: Drop row
menuitem.help: Removes a vector feature from a vector map through attribute selection.

menuitem.label: Reconnect vectors to database
menuitem.help: Reconnects attribute tables for all vector maps from the current mapset to a new database.

menuitem.label: Export raster dataset as VTK time series
Query raster dataset by vector points dataset
Observe specific locations in raster dataset
Animation tool
menuitem.help: Launch animation tool.

menuitem.label: Timeline tool
menuitem.help: Plot temporal extents.

menuitem.label: Temporal plot tool
menuitem.help: Plot temporal values.

menuitem.label: GRASS help
menuitem.help: Display the HTML man pages of GRASS GIS

menuitem.label: GUI help
menuitem.help: Display the HTML man pages of GRASS GIS

menuitem.label: About system
menuitem.help: Prints system information

menuitem.label: About GRASS GIS
menuitem.help: About GRASS GIS
